mcq.statement: In the F₂ generation of di hybrid cross between yellow, round seeded and green wrinkled seeded pea plants, 17 out of 254 seeds were green and wrinkled. Other seeds were: ☆ Yellow and round ☆ Green and round ☆ Yellow and wrinkled. What do these results indicate?

options.a: The allele for wrinkled is recessive but not the allele for green
options.c: Green and wrinkled are both recessive characters
options.d: The alleles for green and wrinkled are linked
